mapper.select: select id, employee_id, employee_name, join_party_time, join_party_introducer, join_group_time, join_party_time_problem_detail, join_party_time_check_result, join_party_time_research_situation, join_party_time_remark, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.join_party_time_info where id = #{id}

select id, employee_id, employee_name, join_party_time, join_party_introducer, join_group_time, join_party_time_problem_detail, join_party_time_check_result, join_party_time_research_situation, join_party_time_remark, update_by, update_time from archivesmanagementsystem.join_party_time_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into archivesmanagementsystem.join_party_time_info(employee_id, employee_name, join_party_time, join_party_introducer, join_group_time, join_party_time_problem_detail, join_party_time_check_result, join_party_time_research_situation, join_party_time_remark, update_by, update_time) values (#{employeeId}, #{employeeName}, #{joinPartyTime}, #{joinPartyIntroducer}, #{joinGroupTime}, #{joinPartyTimeProblemDetail}, #{joinPartyTimeCheckResult}, #{joinPartyTimeResearchSituation}, #{joinPartyTimeRemark}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update archivesmanagementsystem.join_party_time_info
employee_id = #{employeeId},
employee_name = #{employeeName},
join_party_time = #{joinPartyTime},
join_party_introducer = #{joinPartyIntroducer},
join_group_time = #{joinGroupTime},
join_party_time_problem_detail = #{joinPartyTimeProblemDetail},
join_party_time_check_result = #{joinPartyTimeCheckResult},
join_party_time_research_situation = #{joinPartyTimeResearchSituation},
join_party_time_remark = #{joinPartyTimeRemark},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
